about_the_game:
As a unique illusion of Chinese people, the magnificent and grand world of cultivating immortals is loved by many people, including us naturally.
We are deeply impressed by the treasures, monsters and spells in the story, which together form a huge world of fairy cultivation.
When reading, I am eager to try, and I can't wait to dive into it and imagine what I will do.
Yes.
Suppose there were such a world.
What choices do we make, what stories do we create?
Was it brilliant or mediocre?
Is the blood boiling or invincible lonely?
Is it the decisive killer or the righteous?
With this feeling, the game was born, we hope to create a rich and interesting fairy world, to bring players a pleasant experience.



【 Reincarnation system 】

"Samsara Fairy Path · Lingroot Era" wants to restore the real world of fairy cultivation, and the real world of practice must be more cruel than the ordinary world.
These difficulties are like a continuous mountain, lying in front of all the later comers, so that the immortal road is cut off, it is difficult to see a ray of light...
The face of so much suffering is for the real world.
In the same way, breaking these difficulties is the fantasy of our immortals!
As the one to whom Destiny has returned, you will hold the treasure of rebirth, with nine re-entry reincarnations and the opportunity to reincarnate memories.
Each time you reincarnate, the timeline will advance normally, and you will inherit all the exercises, spells and skills of your previous life, and according to the cultivation, increase your talent, in order to fight this cruel world, one life can not break the barrier, then two or three times, until the end.
However, although nine opportunities are many, facing the mountain of practice, it is not easy, you need to make your own choice, responsible for your future, in different lives, you can choose to step by step every day, maximize the benefits; Or you can retreat for a thousand years and practice penance.
The only thing you need to remember is only one, not afraid of difficulties, rise to the difficulties, the world is waiting for you to open the fairy door, a glimpse of the true fairy road!


【 Replacement of different times 】
To cultivate the immortal is to live forever, and to move is hundreds of thousands of years, during this period, the world is naturally evolving and changing, and countless things occur, or chance or natural disasters.
We will arrange different events at different times to enrich the world, which may, by chance, save centuries of penance.

【 Battle system around psychic powers 】
This work is devoted to restoring the world of cultivating the immortal, and builds a corresponding system based on the attributes of the five elements and the practitioners themselves.
In the practice novels, although the realm is the decisive factor of strength, the depth of magic power, magic weapons and spells are also important criteria.
Therefore, we have abandoned the attack power setting and instead built a new battle power system around the spirit power, all spells need to consume spirit power, the more spirit power is consumed, the more destructive the spell, the training of the top Dharma monks, the spirit is extremely deep, and even can defeat Chiki and Jindan monks.
We expect players to experience the kind of accumulation of their own efforts, and finally practice the magic, the same realm invincible, and finally suppress an era, and become the feeling of peerless pride in everyone's mouth, which will be the greatest happiness of reincarnated immortal, and we will carefully set up the world, so that players can enjoy this experience smoothly.

【 Cruel breakthrough 】
Practice is like building a building, only when the foundation is well laid, can we go further.
In the game, the higher the grade of the exercise, the higher the success rate of breakthrough, the stronger the strength.
But equally, it takes a lot of time to practice advanced exercises.
If you can't break through before the deadline, the character will die and start the next life.
For an ordinary monk, life is all, and there is no turning back.
But for players, there are nine worlds of fault tolerance, enough to create miracles.
It is up to you to choose whether you value cultivation or strength.
Long life may be good, but the world happy life seems not bad.

[Five-element Spiritual System]

In addition to the innovation of the psychic system, we have also given concrete symbols to the various mysteries of the spiritual world.
Each of the five attributes will have their own characteristics, can play a different role, players can freely switch in the battle and take effect immediately.
This unique mechanism is what we call spirituality.
For example, the water attribute spirit can create water flow and control water flow, so it has the "flow spirit", which can exert great power by accelerating the flow of water flow, and the specific performance in the game is to constantly stack damage, so that even the weak water spirit force can cut gold and break jade.
In the same way, we have designed three spirits for each attribute, which players can switch freely according to their own situation to cope with complex battles.
For the five elements of spirituality, our expectation is that as a unique advantage of the player, the player can overcome the weak and create more fun.

【 Rich technical system 】
Refiners, alchemies, making charms, arranging array, farming, and cultivating the immortal world will have a system, we will also add one by one, and make a unique play.
